card.text: When Operahouse Gossip enters, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.text: When Pudding Cat dies, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

card.name: Bardic Historian
card.text: When Bardic Historian enters, return target instant, sorcery, or Saga card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: MVX DRAFT ARCHETYPES MVX
card.text: {R}{W}{U} ARTIFACTS {R}{W} GO-WIDE Engineer ways to kill your foes fast using your wide array of artifacts! {W}{U} BUILDINGS Develop your buildings to generate value nobody can compete with. {U}{R}{G} SAGAS/REGALE {U}{R} CONTROL Accrue long-term advantage by consistently casting noncreature spells. {R}{G} AGGRO Regale your prowess to your opponent's face by singing and slinging spells! {G}{U}{B} DELIRIUM {G}{U} RAMP Fill your graveyard to help paint more mana into casting powerful spells! {U}{B} TEMPO Use your late-night motivation to empower evasive threats and disrupt your opponent. {B}{G}{W} FEAST {B}{G} LIFEGAIN Feast on food with your creatures by paying off lifegain synergies. {G}{W} TOKENS Prepare your opponent a twenty-course meal of plants and pain! {W}{B}{R} EXPLOIT {W}{B} ENTERS Blink and reanimate your actors to give their enters triggers an encore. {B}{R} SACRIFICE The show must go on, even if it means sacrificing a few friends.

card.text: Feast — Once during each of your turns, when you gain life or create a token, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Kitty Connoisseur.

card.name: The Grand Festival
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after IV.) Create a tapped Treasure token. Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal an instant, sorcery, or enchantment card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. ​

card.name: Secret Ingredients
card.text: Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance. {1}{G}{W}, Sacrifice a noncreature token: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Chisel MVX
card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+0. Equip {1}

card.name: Avian Augmenteers
card.text: Flying When Avian Augmenteers enters, create a 3/3 colorless Vehicle artifact token with crew 2. Whenever an artifact you control enters, put your choice of a vigilance, menace, trample, or lifelink counter on up to one target Vehicle.

card.name: Show of Strength
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature you control gets +3/+3 and gains "Whenever this creature fights, it fights up to one target creature you don't control." Then it fights up to one target creature you don't control.

card.name: Dramatis Personae
card.text: Menace When Dramatis Personae enters, you may create a 1/1 black Vampire Actor creature token with lifelink. If you don't, each player sacrifices a creature. Then repeat this process four more times.

card.name: Ancestral Guidance
card.text: Reveal the top seven cards of your library. You may put a creature card with mana value 3 or less from among them or from your graveyard onto the battlefield with a deathtouch counter and a lifelink counter on it. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Songweaver Adept
card.text: Vigilance Regale — {U}, {T}: Exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. If you do, you may cast a copy of it. (You still pay its costs. Activate only if you've cast a noncreature spell or put a counter on a noncreature permanent this turn.)

card.name: Storybook Serpent
Grand Overture
card.text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control enters, create a token that's a copy of that creature, except it has haste and isn't legendary. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Knockout Performance
card.text: Knockout Performance deals 6 damage to any nonplayer target. When it deals excess damage this way, you may return a creature with mana value less than or equal to that amount of excess damage from your graveyard to the battlefield. It can't block this turn.

card.name: Pompous Thespian
card.text: When Pompous Thespian enters, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. {2}{W}, Exile Pompous Thespian from your graveyard: Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Festival Shorthopper
card.text: During your turn, Festival Shorthopper has first strike.

card.name: Annul
card.text: Counter target artifact or enchantment spell.

card.name: Stage Double
card.text: Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. If {R} was spent to cast this spell, create a 1/1 black Vampire Actor creature token with lifelink. It gains haste. Sacrifice that token at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Arbiter of Taste
card.text: Ward—Pay 3 life. Menace Whenever an opponent gains life, put a +1/+1 counter on Arbiter of Taste.

card.name: The Bardenmoot
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) Flash If you cast The Bardenmoot, counter up to one target spell. You may cast a spell with mana value less than the number of lore counters on this Saga from your hand without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Diego, Slam Poet
card.text: Trample, haste Whenever a non-final chapter ability of a Saga you control resolves, you may put a lore counter on that Saga.

card.name: Reconstruct
card.text: Choose one — • Destroy target artifact or enchantment. • Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Onerous Old-Timer
card.text: Flying When Onerous Old-Timer enters, create a 1/1 black Vampire Actor creature token with lifelink. Whenever Onerous Old-Timer attacks, you lose 3 life unless you sacrifice a creature.

card.name: Coax the Worldsongs
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) Create a 4/4 red Dragon enchantment creature token with flying and "{R}: This token gets +1/+0 until end of turn." Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to up to one nonplayer target. Add six {R}.

card.name: Demon of Many Pages
card.text: Flying When Demon of Many Pages enters, if you cast it, draw X cards, where X is the number of card types among cards in your graveyard. Then if X is six or more, you may cast a noncreature spell from your hand without paying its mana cost.

card.name: First Chair Violinist
card.text: Exploit, exploit, exploit, exploit (When this enters, for each exploit, you may sacrifice a creature. Exploits trigger sequentially.) Whenever a permanent you control exploits, exile the top card of target opponent's library face down. You may look at and play that card for as long as it remains exiled, and mana of any type can be spent to cast it.

card.name: Nature's Bounty
card.text: When Nature's Bounty enters, create a Food token. Feast — At the beginning of your end step, if you've gained life or created a token this turn, distribute four +1/+1 counters among any number of target creatures you control.

card.name: Dragon MVX
card.text: Flying {R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Atelier Artisan
card.text: Delirium — When Atelier Artisan enters, surveil 3. Then if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, draw a card. (To surveil, look at that many cards from the top of your library. You may mill any number and reorder the rest.)

card.name: Parapet Percher
card.text: Flying When Parapet Percher enters, scry 3.

card.name: Skystone Sculptory
card.text: Whenever Skystone Sculptory becomes untapped, you may put a brick counter on it. {1}, {T}: Create a colorless Equipment artifact token named Chisel with "Equipped creature gets +1/+0" and equip {1}. Built 1+ {3}{W}, {T}: Create a tapped 0/0 colorless Sculpture artifact creature token with "This creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control." Built 3+ {1}, {T}: Create a tapped token that's a copy of an artifact token you control.

card.name: Iterate Over
card.text: Choose one — • Exile target creature. Its controller creates a 1/1 colorless Gnome artifact creature token. • Exile target noncreature, nonland permanent. Its controller creates a Treasure token.

card.name: Gustatorie Explorateur
card.text: Menace Feast — At the beginning of your end step, if you've gained life or created a token this turn, each opponent loses 2 life.

card.name: Antoine, Chef Extraordinaire
card.text: Trample Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, create a Food token. Legacy {1}{W}{B}{G} --- (Back): Antoine's Cookware

card.name: Antoine's Cookware
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, you may pay up to {X}, where X is the amount of life you've gained this turn. If you do, create that many 1/1 green Plant creature tokens. Whenever a token you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you do, draw a card. --- (Front): Antoine, Chef Extraordinaire

card.name: Marquis Vaasco de Moraes
card.text: When Vaasco enters, you may return target non-Zombie creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Legacy {R}{W}{B} --- (Back): The Grand Revival

card.name: The Grand Revival
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) Sacrifice a creature or Marquis Vaasco de Moraes. You gain 3 life. If The Grand Revival would be put into exile this turn, instead exile it, then return it to the battlefield. (Front face up.) Exile The Grand Revival, then return it to the battlefield. --- (Front): Marquis Vaasco de Moraes

card.name: Nicola, Inspired Artist
card.text: Whenever Nicola attacks, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card. Legacy {1}{B}{G}{U} --- (Back): Night Upon the Cosmos

card.name: Night Upon the Cosmos
card.text: Delirium — At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, you may sacrifice Night Upon the Cosmos. If you do, put two cards you own from outside the game into your hand. {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. --- (Front): Nicola, Inspired Artist

card.name: Isabella, City Builder
card.text: Vigilance Whenever Isabella attacks, untap each artifact you control. Legacy {2}{U}{R}{W} --- (Back): The Spire of Merveaux

card.name: The Spire of Merveaux
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, draw a card, then you may put a brick counter on each Building you control. Ward {4} Built 2+ Whenever you cast an artifact spell, untap each artifact you control. Built 5+ Artifacts you control have indestructible. --- (Front): Isabella, City Builder

card.name: The Flourishing
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — Mill five cards, then put any number of artifact and/or enchantment cards milled this way into your hand. II — Artifact and enchantment spells you cast this turn cost {2} less to cast. III — Create a token that's a copy of up to one target artifact or enchantment you control with a different name.

card.name: Brasio, Bardic Chronicler
card.text: Regale — {T}: Add {R}. (Activate only if you've cast a noncreature spell or put a counter on a noncreature permanent this turn.) Legacy {G}{U}{R} --- (Back): The Long Chant

card.name: The Long Chant
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.) You may put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. The Long Chant deals 1 damage to any target. Draw a card, then remove all lore counters from The Long Chant. (It's not sacrificed.) --- (Front): Brasio, Bardic Chronicler

card.name: Frymaster's Pan
card.text: Frymaster's Pan enters tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {G}. Feast — {T}: Add {B}{G}. Activate only if you've gained life or created a token this turn.

card.name: Pascal, Critics' Favorite
card.text: [+1]: Create a 1/1 green Plant creature token and a Food token. [-2]: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Creature tokens you control gain first strike and trample until end of turn. [-5]: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control get +X/+X, where X is the amount of life you've gained this turn."

card.name: The Rejection of the Monarchy
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — The Rejection of the Monarchy deals 3 damage to any target. II — Create a tapped Treasure token. III — Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.

card.name: Castleway Crane
card.text: Whenever one or more other artifacts you control enter, you may put a brick counter on a Building you control. (It retains abilities.) {T}: Add {W} or {U}. Built 1+ {T}: Untap target artifact with a different name. Built 3+ Once each turn, when you cast an artifact spell, you may draw a card.

card.name: Odette L'or, Fickle Painter
card.text: Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, create a 2/1 blue Inkling creature token with flying.

card.name: Skystone Gargoyle
card.text: Flying When Skystone Gargoyle enters, you may return target artifact card with a different name from your graveyard to your hand.
